Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Riverside Mall
ShortDescription: WB 21 Cermak rrtd via Cermak, Harlem, 24th, mall Drive entrance-exit into Cermak, await recovery at Harlem & Cermak due to police activity nr No. Riverside Mall

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Harlem, 24th, mall Drive entrance-exit into Cermak, await recovery at Harlem, then resume normal route on Cermak due to police activity near North Riverside Mall.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
